title: ECG Sensor for Cloud Analytics
summary: The product acquires data from the ECG probes and uploads to the Cloud for analytics. The Cloud Analytics attempts to detect anomalies in the input pattern and alert the doctor if required.
contributions: Design the hardware and ECG probe interfaces. Develop prototypes and verify the functionality. Write firmware on bare-metal and Embedded Linux Drivers Lay the PCB out and generate BOM.
